textTemplates.name: Template_EmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.ServiceResource.Supervisor__r.LastName},

New service appointment assigned to you {!$Record.ServiceAppointment.Case__r.CaseNumber} - {!$Record.ServiceAppointment.AppointmentNumber} Check the details on portal.

Case Status: {!$Record.ServiceAppointment.Case__r.Status}

Appointment Status: {!$Record.ServiceAppointment.Status} @{!$Record.ServiceAppointment.SchedStartTime}
